description:
JOIN OVER 1,300 SUCCESSFUL STUDENTS WHO HAVE ALREADY TAKEN THIS COURSE

Start making money, with no outlay and no experience whatsoever, immediately - just like my current 1,300+ students!

LATEST: Course Fully Updated For April 2015

+++++++++++++++++++++++

Find out how you can increase the number of your customers, using a proven step by step formula of clear and simple steps to get sustainable orders.

It is a proven technique for getting orders for photography of any genre. Fast and easy.

There is a lot of photographers nowadays. In all cities, there are photographers, agencies. They offer different services, special propositions and extra bonuses. Here we see a lot of beginners trying to make their way earning money. They have sites, facebook pages, advertisements and etc.

To break through the information noise is becoming harder and harder. And as for the client, it's very hard to choose proper photographer.

The choice is in your hands - be like everyone else or qualitatively stand out and receive more orders for the photo shooting.

In the course we will discuss such topics:

  • Process of finding customers for photographer
  • Photo site
  • How to create a portfolio
  • Driving traffic to the site and social profiles
  • Differences between genres of commercial photo shooting
  • Online Advertising
  • Using Pages and groups in social networks
  • Photosites
  • Offline advertising
  • Wedding show
  • Partnerships
  • Exhibitions
  • Recommendations
  • First Contact with a client and correspondence
  • Phone talks
  • Meeting and portfolio presenting
  • How sell your portfolio
  • Packaging of your services
  • Signing a contract
  • Pre-shooting
  • Drawing up a shooting plan
  • Shooting Process
  • Hardware for shooting
  • How to choose Locations
  • Required Footage
  • How to work with clients after shooting
  • How to pick photos
  • Color correction
  • Retouching
  • Promoting your shots
  • Giving away finished product
  • Upsell
  • Discounts
  • Customers for life
  • How to work with client base and relationship management
title: Photographer: Full Promotion Package to Get Clients
